metadata.synopsis: A novice of the church of the Absolute, by turns praying to herself or speaking to us, who she sees as a leading follower of her god

0.speaker: Pilgrim Nalira
0.text: The prisoners below are gone, True Soul. I cannot understand why they would flee Her mercy.
0.context: InternalNodeContext: The prisoners successfully escaped from Moonrise's dungeons (perhaps all, perhaps only one)NodeContext: Confused, hurt - prisoners in the cell escaped - she saw them as heathens her church was trying to 'save'

2.speaker: Pilgrim Nalira
2.text: The people of Baldur's Gate will embrace Her gift. They must.
2.context: InternalNodeContext: The prisoners successfully escaped from Moonrise's dungeons (perhaps all, perhaps only one)NodeContext: Determination, conviction

3.speaker: Pilgrim Nalira
3.context: InternalNodeContext: General fallback nodes where none of the above apply. Almost ALWAYS comes after Execution state (directly above)NodeContext: Head bowed and eyes closed, praying to herself

4.speaker: Pilgrim Nalira
4.text: No gods can stop us. Soon, we bring Her glory to Baldur's Gate.
4.context: InternalNodeContext: The player has helped the cult kidnap Isobel and bring her to Moonrise.

5.speaker: Pilgrim Nalira
5.text: The cleric from the inn is with us, thanks to you. Even Selûne cannot resist our Absolute.
5.context: InternalNodeContext: The player has helped the cult kidnap Isobel and bring her to Moonrise.NodeContext: Excited - her god is proving more powerful then the 'old' gods

6.speaker: Pilgrim Nalira
6.text: Disciple Z'rell wants to see us. You, me, all of us. I know she does.
6.context: NodeContext: Eager and a little desperate - she's being kept from seeing a priest

7.speaker: Pilgrim Nalira
7.text: They say you braved the dark to save the General's advisor. Bless you.
7.context: InternalNodeContext: The player has helped Balthazar (and this Nightsong) return to Moonrise. He's down in the Colony.

8.speaker: Pilgrim Nalira
8.text:
Of many hearts, one soul. Of many thoughts, one mind. Of many parts, one whole.
In Her name, Her design.
8.context: NodeContext: Head bowed and eyes closed, praying to herself. Whispered and quick, as if one passage in a long litany.

9.speaker: Pilgrim Nalira
9.text: She walks with you. I can feel Her.
9.context: InternalNodeContext: General fallback nodes where none of the above apply. Almost ALWAYS comes after Execution state (directly above)NodeContext: Looking up at us with awe, rapturous to be so near a blessed person of her 'god'

10.speaker: Pilgrim Nalira
10.text: The Absolute Herself called us here. They cannot stop us from seeing Z'rell now!
10.context: NodeContext: Eager and a little desperate - she's being kept from seeing a priest
